content: Do new lints need a compiler (or lang??) FCP?
The general policy we've used in the past is a compiler team MCP and then a lang team FCP on the implementation PR (giving them a heads up during the MCP is also a good idea).

The cost/benefit ratio is too high for this lint, IMO.
There are numerous ways to define something useless (with the uselesness being obvious on any use attempt).
Why highlighting this case specifically and add a bunch of code to support? Is code like this written accidentally and commonly enough?
I would be significantly more useful to push for #86176 instead.
